about_the_game:
Welcome to Reprieve, a town floating above a writhing abyss, formed by murder locations and inhabited by killers. Those unfortunate enough to end up here find themselves trapped, and are inevitably consumed by The Void. Can you escape with your wit and courage, or will you be absorbed like all the rest?

Inspired by classic point-and-click adventures and indie masterpieces, The Void Calls is dark, atmospheric, and exploratory.


  • Point-And-Click Interface - Interact with anything, use items to solve puzzles.
  • Discover Secrets - Not everything in Reprieve is as it first seems.
  • Converse - You'll have to get to know the strange townsfolk to get out.
  • Explore - It's a big town, with plenty to see.


  • Dozens of hand-drawn pixel art environments
  • Moody and dynamic lighting system
  • Dark and intense original soundtrack by SnakeDere
  • Hundreds of original sound effects and ambient soundscapes
